ygData.subject: RE: Cleric's and PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: You cant heal mobs even if they are fighting you.  (Unless that has changed recently) Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
You cant heal mobs even if they are fighting you. (Unless that has
changed recently)

Mr. J Daniels


On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, Chas Watkins wrote:

> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> How interesting. A high level Cleric could wreck havoc. All he has to do
> watch a player fight a MOB. Make a token swipe at the MOB. Then stand back
> and Heal it till it kills the player or chases him off the Zone.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris Wheeler [mailto:wheelech@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 11:51 AM
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric's and PvP
>
>
> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> I play a cleric on The Rathe. I have experimented with healing MOBs, and as
> far as I can tell , the answer is no. Same goes for buffs. That is, if you
> mean to buff them while they are fighting other players. If they are
> fighting you, I think you can heal them, as I have done this accidentally in
> the past. I haven't done it recently, so I can't be 100% certain. Though I
> do seem to recall seeing the MOB's life bar inch back up after an accidental
> heal on my behalf.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
> Sent: 1999/08/23 2:41 PM
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric's and PvP
>
>
> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> Has anyone tried healing or buffing a NPC or a MOB. I play a Cleric on
> Rallos Zek (PvP) and my main rationale is I like to heal. I play a "good"
> cleric and have healed bad/good races. My main irritation is when I'm
> suddenly PK'd by a member of my own race. (High Elf. I hang my head in shame
> at my fallen brothers and sisters)
>
> Anyway normally there is a +/- 4 range for PvP correct? It seems to me that
> the Cleric is uniquely positioned so that we can severely inconvenience
> other players far below our level. If they are fighting a MOB can we heal
> the MOB? Can we buff it? I must admit I have never tried it, I just thought
> of it. Has anyone any experience of this??
>
> Regards
>
> Nynenom of Rallos Zek
>
